results.name: Permutation of natural numbers: a(1) = 0, after which a(2n) = 1 + 2*a(n), a(2n+1) = 2 * a(A269370(n)).
comment: Note the indexing: Domain starts from 1, range from 0.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1024
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
